EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s here! The BackFlip Into Summer Sales Contest kicks off today.
As a reminder, the contest will run through Sunday, June 17th.
For tips on how to make the most of the contest, refer back to the BackFlip Into Summer: Tips for Success manual attached here. Additionally, if you haven’t had the chance to take your sales associates through YETI training, it’s not too late!
- Reach out to (insert TSM name) to set up a clinic
- Head to Experticity.com to take a Tundra, Hopper or Rambler module.
- Share these training videos with your staff.
Lastly, be sure you’re tracking sales for core products (not accessories) of the following categories on the provided backroom poster: Tundra, Hopper, Rambler and LoadOut.
The first week of the contest will run from today, May 4 – Sunday, May 13. To be eligible for the prizes, be sure to submit your sales associates’ weekly sales by 4pm CT, Monday, May 14th on this form: https://yeti.formstack.com/forms/backflip_into_summer.
Best of luck!
Terms and conditions apply. See full contest rules here.
